channel.title: Compile error =[
channel.description:
This is my compiler. [code]@echo off title Epic's compiler V2
:def %b%== b7 %t%== t5 :main cls
echo --- V1 is Not available anymore echo --- echo --- working on v3... but for now v2 is out and ready to compile ur files echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo -- Epic Owner's All jdk version Compiler echo -- echo -- commands below (no CAPS) echo -- echo -- Works with all jdk versions (not any jdk 5's tho) echo -- echo -- only versions 6u1 - 6u12 (netbeans ok) and 7u1 echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo ---- *** Main Commands *** echo ---- echo ---- com = compile ur server files. echo ---- echo ---- run = run server (basically same thing as runserver.bat). echo ---- echo ---- *** Seconhand Commands *** echo ---- echo ---- set = change settingz... echo ---- echo ---- creds = Epic Creits echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo ---- No Leechin!! unless all credits to Epic Owner echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
set /p mains=-- Select a cmd..-
if %mains%==com goto com if %mains%==run goto run
if %mains%==COM goto com if %mains%==RUN goto run
if %mains%==set goto set if %mains%==creds goto creds if %mains%==extra goto extra
goto main
:com cls title Compiling server.. echo --- Its Compiling time :) echo --- processing.... echo --- goto com2
:com2 title Compiling... echo --- checking java version ( 6u1 to 6u12) (7u1) echo ---(6u1-6u12 and 7u1 only!!) echo --- IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN" (GOTO COM13) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN" (GOTO COM12) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN" (GOTO COM11) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN" (GOTO COM10) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN" (GOTO COM09) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN" (GOTO COM08) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN" (GOTO COM07) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN" (GOTO COM06) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN" (GOTO COM05) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN" (GOTO COM04) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN" (GOTO COM03) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN" (GOTO COM02) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN" (GOTO COM01) goto comerrorxxx
:COM13 echo --- Found JDK 1.7.0_01 SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin echo --- Results: javac *.java echo --- SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy! pause goto main
:COM11 echo --- Found JDK 1.6.0_12 SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin echo --- Results: javac *.java echo --- SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy! pause goto main
:COM11 echo --- Found JDK 1.6.0_11 SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin echo --- Results: javac *.java echo --- SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy! pause goto main
:COM10 echo --- Found JDK 1.6.0_10 SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin echo --- Results: javac *.java echo --- SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy! pause goto main
:COM09 echo --- Found JDK 1.6.0_09 SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin echo --- Results: javac *.java echo --- SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy! pause goto main
:COM08 echo --- Found JDK 1.6.0_08 SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin echo --- Results: javac *.java echo --- SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy! pause goto main
:COM07 echo --- Found JDK 1.6.0_07 SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin echo --- Results: javac *.java echo --- SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy! pause goto main
:COM06 echo --- Found JDK 1.6.0_06 SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin echo --- Results: javac *.java echo --- SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy! pause goto main
:COM05 echo --- Found JDK 1.6.0_05 SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin echo --- Results: javac *.java echo --- SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy! pause goto main
:COM04 echo --- Found JDK 1.6.0_04 SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin echo --- Results: javac *.java echo --- SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy! pause goto main
:COM03 echo --- Found JDK 1.6.0_03 SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin echo --- Results: javac *.java echo --- SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy! pause goto main
:COM2 echo --- Found JDK 1.6.0_02 SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin echo --- Results: javac *.java echo --- SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy! pause goto main
:COM01 echo --- Found JDK 1.6.0_01 SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin echo --- Results: javac *.java echo --- SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy! pause goto main
:COMERRORXXX echo --- version of JDK 6u1 to 6u12 or 7u1 found... echo --- go download java and try to get the latest version pause goto main
:extra cls title Epic Owner's extraz echo dont leech i beg please.. echo if you do give me like 50% creds?? please?? pause goto main
:run cls title Running Server... echo --- Port: echo --- 43594 IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN" (GOTO RUN13) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN" (GOTO RUN12) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN" (GOTO RUN11) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN" (GOTO RUN10) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN" (GOTO RUN09) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN" (GOTO RUN08) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN" (GOTO RUN07) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN" (GOTO RUN06) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN" (GOTO RUN05) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN" (GOTO RUN04) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN" (GOTO RUN03) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN" (GOTO RUN02) IF EXIST "%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN" (GOTO RUN01) :RUN13 echo --- Running using JDK 1.7.0_01... SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server echo --- You Fail... l0l pause goto main :RUN12 echo --- Running using JDK 1.6.0_12... SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server echo --- You Fail... l0l pause goto main :RUN11 echo --- Running using JDK 1.6.0_11... SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server echo --- You Fail... l0l pause goto main :RUN10 echo --- Running using JDK 1.6.0_10... SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server echo --- You Fail... l0l pause goto main :RUN09 echo --- Running using JDK 1.6.0_09... SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server echo --- You Fail... l0l pause goto main :RUN08 echo --- Running using JDK 1.6.0_08... SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server echo --- You Fail... l0l pause goto main :RUN07 echo --- Running using JDK 1.6.0_07... SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server echo --- You Fail... l0l pause goto main :RUN06 echo --- Running using JDK 1.6.0_06... SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server echo --- You Fail... l0l pause goto main :RUN05 echo --- Running using JDK 1.6.0_05... SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server echo --- You Fail... l0l pause goto main :RUN04 echo --- Running using JDK 1.6.0_04... SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server echo --- You Fail... l0l pause goto main :RUN03 echo --- Running using JDK 1.6.0_03... SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server echo --- You Fail... l0l pause goto main :RUN02 echo --- Running using JDK 1.6.0_02... SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server echo --- You Fail... l0l pause goto main :RUN01 echo --- Running using JDK 1.6.0_01... SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%; SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server echo --- You Fail... l0l.. you Need JDK 1.6.0_xx or 1.7.0_01 pause cls goto main title Epic's Compiler :set cls echo --- Enter commandz for BaCkGrOuNd CoLoR. echo --- B0 = Black echo --- B1 = Blue echo --- B2 = Green echo --- B3 = Cyan echo --- B4 = Red echo --- B5 = Purple echo --- B6 = Yellow echo --- B7 = White echo --- pick one :P echo ---------------- echo --- Enter commandz for TeXt cOlOr. echo --- T0 = Black echo --- T1 = Blue echo --- T2 = Green echo --- T3 = Cyan echo --- T4 = Red echo --- T5 = Purple echo --- T6 = Yellow echo --- T7 = White echo --- Pick one :P
set /p s= -- uR cHoIcE:
if %s%== B0 (set b=0) if %s%== B1 (set b=1) if %s%== B2 (set b=2) if %s%== B3 (set b=3) if %s%== B4 (set b=4) if %s%== B5 (set b=5) if %s%== B6 (set b=6) if %s%== B7 (set b=F) if %s%== T0 (set t=0) if %s%== T1 (set t=1) if %s%== T2 (set t=2) if %s%== T3 (set t=3) if %s%== T4 (set t=4) if %s%== T5 (set t=5) if %s%== T6 (set t=6) if %s%== T7 (set t=F)
color %b%%t% pause cls goto main
:creds cls echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- echo --- Sorry but V1 was deleted cuz of leech frenzy echo --- echo --- Thanks to: echo --- echo --- Epic Owner, owner of epicscape.zapto.org echo --- echo --- If it didnt work then u dont have java echo --- echo --- Contact me at EpicC0d3r@gmail.com echo --- echo --- DO NOT LEECH IM SICK OF YOU LEECHERS echo --- echo --- If You need any server help contact me. im good at coding/ servers echo --- echo --- My Moparscape forums name is Elvemage 0o (zero then lowercase o) echo ------------------------------------------------------------------------------- pause cls goto main [/code]
And this is my error [code]--- Its Compiling time :) --- processing.... --- --- checking java version ( 6u1 to 6u12) (7u1) ---(6u1-6u12 and 7u1 only!!) --- --- Found JDK 1.6.0_06 --- Results: javac: file not found: *.java Usage: javac <options> <source files> use -help for a list of possible options --- SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy! Press any key to continue . . .[/code] can some 1 plzzz help me

item.title: Compile error =[
item.dc:creator: @kihomura Kihomura
item.description:
@kihomura wrote:

@echo off "C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin\javac.exe" *.java pause

item.title: Compile error =[
item.dc:creator: @crazzydude49 crazzydude49
item.description:
@crazzydude49 wrote:

This is my compiler.

[code]@echo off
title Epic’s compiler V2

:def
%b%== b7
%t%== t5
:main
cls

echo — V1 is Not available anymore
echo —
echo — working on v3… but for now v2 is out and ready to compile ur files
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo – Epic Owner’s All jdk version Compiler
echo –
echo – commands below (no CAPS)
echo –
echo – Works with all jdk versions (not any jdk 5’s tho)
echo –
echo – only versions 6u1 - 6u12 (netbeans ok) and 7u1
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo ---- *** Main Commands ***
echo ----
echo ---- com = compile ur server files.
echo ----
echo ---- run = run server (basically same thing as runserver.bat).
echo ----
echo ---- *** Seconhand Commands ***
echo ----
echo ---- set = change settingz…
echo ----
echo ---- creds = Epic Creits
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------
echo ---- No Leechin!! unless all credits to Epic Owner
echo -------------------------------------------------------------------------------

set /p mains=-- Select a cmd…-

if %mains%==com goto com
if %mains%==run goto run

if %mains%==COM goto com
if %mains%==RUN goto run

if %mains%==set goto set
if %mains%==creds goto creds
if %mains%==extra goto extra

goto main

:com
cls
title Compiling server…
echo — Its Compiling time
echo — processing…
echo —
goto com2

:com2
title Compiling…
echo — checking java version ( 6u1 to 6u12) (7u1)
echo —(6u1-6u12 and 7u1 only!!)
echo —
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO COM12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO COM11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO COM10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO COM09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO COM08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO COM07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO COM06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO COM05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO COM04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO COM03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO COM02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO COM01)
goto comerrorxxx

:COM13
echo — Found JDK 1.7.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_12
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM11
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_11
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM10
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_10
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_10\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM09
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_09
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_09\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM08
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_08
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_08\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM07
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_07
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_07\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM06
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_06
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_06\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM05
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_05
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_05\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM04
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_04
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_04\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM03
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_03
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_03\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM2
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_02
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_02\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COM01
echo — Found JDK 1.6.0_01
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_01\bin
echo — Results:
javac *.java
echo — SuCcEsS Yay! now were all happy!
pause
goto main

:COMERRORXXX
echo — version of JDK 6u1 to 6u12 or 7u1 found…
echo — go download java and try to get the latest version
pause
goto main

:extra
cls
title Epic Owner’s extraz
echo dont leech i beg please…
echo if you do give me like 50% creds?? please??
pause
goto main

:run
cls
title Running Server…
echo — Port:
echo — 43594
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.7.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN13)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_12\BIN” (GOTO RUN12)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_11\BIN” (GOTO RUN11)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_10\BIN” (GOTO RUN10)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_09\BIN” (GOTO RUN09)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_08\BIN” (GOTO RUN08)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_07\BIN” (GOTO RUN07)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_06\BIN” (GOTO RUN06)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_05\BIN” (GOTO RUN05)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_04\BIN” (GOTO RUN04)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_03\BIN” (GOTO RUN03)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_02\BIN” (GOTO RUN02)
IF EXIST “%programfiles%\JAVA\JDK1.6.0_01\BIN” (GOTO RUN01)
:RUN13
echo — Running using JDK 1.7.0_01…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.7.0_01\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo — You Fail… l0l
pause
goto main
:RUN12
echo — Running using JDK 1.6.0_12…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_12\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo — You Fail… l0l
pause
goto main
:RUN11
echo — Running using JDK 1.6.0_11…
SET CLASSPATH=Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin;%CLASSPATH%;
SET PATH=C:\Program Files\Java\jdk1.6.0_11\bin
java -Xmx1024m -cp .;./jython.jar;./MySql/mysql-connector-java-3.0.17-ga-bin.jar server
echo — You Fail… l0l
pause
goto main
:RUN10
echo — Running using JDK 1.6.0_10…

echo — B6 = Yellow
echo — B7 = White

echo — T1 = Blue
echo — T2 = Green
echo — T3 = Cyan
echo — T4 = Red
echo — T5 = Purple
echo — T6 = Yellow
echo — T7 = White
echo — Pick one

set /p s= – uR cHoIcE:

if %s%== B0 (set b=0)
if %s%== B1 (set b=1)
if %s%== B2 (set b=2)
if %s%== B3 (set b=3)
if %s%== B4 (set b=4)
if %s%== B5 (set b=5)
if %s%== B6 (set b=6)
if %s%== B7 (set b=F)
if %s%== T0 (set t=0)
if %s%== T1 (set t=1)
if %s%== T2 (set t=2)
if %s%== T3 (set t=3)
if %s%== T4 (set t=4)
if %s%== T5 (set t=5)
if %s%== T6 (set t=6)
if %s%== T7 (set t=F)

color %b%%t%
pause
cls
goto main
